chunk:
Green People, Rejuvenating Eye Cream

Brand: green

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: AQUA (SPRING WATER), GLYCERIN (VEGETABLE DERIVED), CETEARYL ALCOHOL (EMULSIFYING PLANT WAX), BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER*^, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL*, OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE) FRUIT OIL*, SQUALANE (FROM OLIVE OIL), CETEARYL GLUCOSIDE (PLAN

ARYL GLUCOSIDE (PLANT DERIVED EMULSIFIER), ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) OIL*^, GLYCERYL STEARATE (PLANT DERIVED EMULSIFIER), SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA) SEED OIL*, CAESALPINIA SPINOSA (TARA BUSH) GUM, ENTEROMORPHA COMPRESSA (SEAWEED) EXTRACT, ALOE BARBADENSIS (ALOE VERA) LEAF JUICE POWDER*, PERILLA OCYMOIDES (PERILLA) SEED OIL*, OENOTHERA BIENNIS (EV

ENOTHERA BIENNIS (EVENING PRIMROSE) SEED OIL*, PERSEA GRATISSIMA (AVOCADO) OIL*, BAICALIN (BAICAL SCULLCAP EXTRACT), ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT*, HELICHRYSUM STOECHAS (EVERLASTING FLOWER) EXTRACT*, ALTHAEA OFFICINALIS (MARSHMALLOW) ROOT EXTRACT*, PERSEA

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions
ty, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
